mapper.select: select s.idx, s.repo, s.member, (select member.nick as repo_owner from member where repo.owner=member.idx ) as repo_owner, member.nick as member_nick,repo.name as repo_name,(SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, push.date, CURDATE()) from push where push.repo = repo.idx limit 1) as push_date, (select count(star.repo)from star where star.repo=repo.idx) as star_count, (select count(star.idx) from star where s.repo=star.repo and star.member=${idx}) as isMy from ggitdb.star s, ggitdb.repo, ggitdb.member where s.member=(select member.idx from member where member.nick=#{nick})and member.idx = s.member and s.repo = repo.idx;
SELECT count(idx) FROM star WHERE member=${idx} and repo=(select idx from repo where name=#{reponame})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO star(repo,member) VALUES((select repo.idx from repo where repo.name=#{reponame}),${idx})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM star WHERE member=${idx} and (select repo.idx from repo where repo.name=#{reponame})
